hotels.name: Nakar Hotel
hotels.description: On a main road, this sleek hotel with views of the Bay of Palma is a 12-minute walk from Palma Cathedral and 10 km from Palma de Mallorca Airport. Stylish rooms come with rainfall showers in glass-walled bathrooms, along with free Wi-Fi, 100-cm flat-screens, Nespresso coffeemakers, and minifridges. Upgraded rooms add balconies, or patio decks with hot tubs. Suites feature living areas. An included breakfast buffet is served in a relaxed dining room. There's also a chic 8th-floor restaurant/bar with rooftop views. A spa features a sauna, a steam room and an indoor heated pool. A rooftop infinity pool overlooks the bay and the cathedral.
hotels.address: Av. de Jaume III, 21, Centre, 07012 Palma, Illes Balears, Spain

hotels.name: Hotel Almudaina
hotels.description: Set in the shopping district along Avenida Jaime III, this relaxed hotel is 2.9 km from Bellver Castle and 11 km from Palma de Mallorca Airport. Decorated in neutral tones, the laid-back rooms feature flat-screen TVs and Wi-Fi, plus desks and sofabeds. Some rooms have city views. A breakfast buffet is offered. There's a polished Mediterranean restaurant, as well as a rooftop terrace lounge/bar with a solarium and views of the city. Bike rentals are available.
hotels.address: Av. de Jaume III, 9, Centre, 07012 Palma, Illes Balears, Spain

hotels.name: Hotel Palladium
hotels.description: Set in a glass-fronted building opposite the 19-Passeig Mallorca 38 bus stop, this modern hotel is a 12-minute walk from the 14th-century Royal Palace of La Almudaina. Bright, contemporary rooms come with free Wi-Fi and smart TVs, as well as desks and minibars; most have balconies. Room service is available. Amenities include a hip bar, a gym and a sauna. A breakfast buffet (fee) is served in a refined dining area.
hotels.address: Pg. de Mallorca, 40, Centre, 07012 Palma, Illes Balears, Spain

hotels.name: Protur Naisa Palma Hotel
hotels.description: Within the city center, this polished hotel is 13 minutes' walk from the harbor and the Bay of Palma coast, and 11 km from Palma de Mallorca Airport. Understated, soundproofed rooms with high-thread-count sheets provide complimentary Wi-Fi, smart TVs and minifridges, plus tea and coffeemakers. Some upgraded rooms have terraces with hot tubs. Suites add Nespresso machines. A rooftop outdoor pool is flanked by a terrace. There's a lobby cafe and an informal bar/lounge. A spa features a hammam, a sauna and an indoor pool, as well as a gym and a hot tub. Bike rentals are available. A breakfast buffet and parking are both offered for a fee.
hotels.address: C/ de Simó Ballester, 6, 07011 Palma, Illes Balears, Spain

hotels.name: Concepció by Nobis
hotels.description: Set within a 16th-century building in the Old Town, this upscale hotel is an 8-minute walk from the Es Baluard Museum of Contemporary Art of Palma and 13 minutes' walk from the Cathedral of Santa Maria of Palma. It's 11 km from Palma de Mallorca Airport. Chic rooms have decorative tile floors, Wi-Fi and flat-screens, along with minibars. Upgraded rooms add sitting areas. One features a terrace, while a suite includes an in-room free-standing tub. Amenities consist of a fashionable restaurant, an outdoor pool and a terrace, plus a bar and a lounge. Breakfast is available.
hotels.address: C/ de la Concepció, 34, Centre, 07012 Palma, Illes Balears, Spain
